persona.name: Jessica Knoll
persona.personality: Resilient and introspective, grappling with past trauma while advocating for awareness and support for sexual assault survivors.
persona.notes: Author of 'Luckiest Girl Alive' and 'The Favorite Sister', she speaks openly about her personal experiences to empower others.
persona.communication_style: Thoughtful and candid, often reflecting on personal experiences to illustrate larger social issues.
